title: Panasonic 81 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED TV  (TH-32C350DX)

product_specification.In The Box:
Wall Mount
Remote Control
Power Cable
User Manual
Warranty Card
TV Unit
2 Cells
product_specification.Other Video Features:
Dot Noise Reduction
Support Format (Movie): AVI, MP4, VOB
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is limited to manufacturing defects only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Any external accessories (such as battery, cable, etc.)
Warranty does not cover
Any damage caused due to tampering of the product by an unauthorized agent, liability for loss of data, recorded images or business opportunity loss.
Damage caused to the product due to improper installation by customer
Normal wear and tear to magnetic heads, audio, video, laser pick-ups and tv picture tubes, panel
Damages caused to the product by accident, lightening, ingress of water, fire, dropping or excessive shock
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: On-site Service, Customer needs to call the nearby Authorized Service Center, service engineer will come to the site to get the product repaired or inspected.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.Picture Quality: Dot noise (visual distortion) is greatly reduced by Panasonic's unique detection and correction technologies.
product_description.100 Hz Backlight Motion Rate: You can watch fast-paced car chases down to the last detail with this TV. It has a motion rate of 100 Hz which results in smooth moving images.

review:
I am writing this review after two days usage,

Pros;
TV was very easy to setup,
Awesome CLARITY while viewing HD channels didn't imagine it would be so great.
USB play almost all formats
Viewing angles, contrast, sharpness are much better when compared to Samsung & LG which are priced more for the same specs.

Cons;
Sounds is Ok,
User Interface and Remote not user friendly, u wont need use either of these when you have a DTH connection.
Once the TV is delivered, Installation will only happen after 3-4 days if its a City***

Picture and Sound clarity is exceptional overall I am satisfied. Most of the reviews told the sound is not so great but its not like that.

Picture:
You need to change the default settings like contrast, sharp, color etc and feel the difference.

Sources:
Audio OUT is not available
Component source is not available .. only 1 HDMI, 1 Composite and 1 USB , but for a basic version these sources are enough..

Bootup Time:
TV takes quite a long time to boot and then finally its showing Panasonic Logo.

Manual Button:
Also the manual button at the bottom ( joystick) seems to be very difficult when compared with a Samsung joystick button.

Remote:
Remote does not have Play, Fast Forward etc.. Using it in Media is like a night mare also jumping to the next pages etc are not convenient from the user point of view.

Packing: Comes with a regular TV carton with plastic wrap. Also comes with a wall bracket too.

Overall it was a nice experience with FlipKart.. They have delivered the TV on the stated time and before the committed time slot.

bought in 16400 bucks at the time of sale and working properly. If u are using just as a normal led tv than its good but if u wishes to use pendrives or home theatre with this tv then u will not satisfied as this tv does not run most of the video format throught USB port and does not have any facility to connect the home theatre. The picture quality is very good and audio quality is also godd and useful for those who only wishes to watch TV either with Cable connection or set top box.

Hi,

Received & completely demo installation within 2 days from the date of Order. Thanks to Flipkart.

The product is value for money. I have downloaded FULL HD video songs from youtube & played it via USB. It's amazing picture quality and can be compared to FULL HD Televisions. Sound quality is not so bad. Remote is not standard compared to Sony & other brands but doesn't matter.

Finally to keep in mind is high picture quality depends on HD channels, blue ray dvds, HD videos..etc. These works better even with HD ready channels also.

If you are planning to buy this product then just close your eyes and can go ahead.
I have purched the led tv.this is according to my wishes .picture & sound quality is really good.specially its viewing angle is very wide. i am happy to the led tv.

This is my third day since I've been using this TV. It's nice, affordable and a wise buy who has a tight budget. Picture is excellent, sountd is prettey good if not excellent. Viewing angles are acceptable. Remote is confusing, as many other reviewers mentioned, but has powerful sensor. In other words, it's a very good basic LED TV.

I have bought Panasonic LED TV about six months back and I am very satisfied with the product. Sound output and picture quality is excellent. Panasonic product is reasonably priced compared to other major Korean brands. Need less to say Flipkart delivery was on time and installation process went smoothly. Will strongly recommend this product.
nice product with good budget and those who are saying not good quality picture pls use other company led tv...your false negative comments like this impacts the company brand

Nice TV, Sound quality is too good and also picture quality nice.
TV looks is great.
Overall this TV is nice.
Flipkart delivery is too good.
I am fully satisfied this TV.

It has been 12 days since the tv was delivered. Its better than most of the other telvisions in the 32 inch range. It is better than LG, Samsung and others in terms of sound, design and picture quality, supporting almost all HD quality movies, even the 1080p ones. I will say that sony gives a far better product than this tv. Which includes picture clarity and quality and sound also. But considering sony's price and my usage (generally we use tv for tata sky); this panasonic tv is worth it. Also panasonic offers on site warranty and extended free warranty which was an important factor for me buying this tv.

Product Delivery

Flipkart has done excellent job as usual. They had delivered the product in the communicated time frame.

Installation and Service

Service Engineer from Panasonic was ready much before the delivery. I had to stop him as the delivery was not happened that time. I called him soon after the delivery and he came to my place with in an hour time. He has installed the TV and explained us the basic functionalities.

Product

Pros.

Good Product in this price range. The important quality of this brand is its Picture quality. I felt far better than other brands in this price range. As of now no other problems.

Cons.

Sound quality is ok. But enough for normal family.

Yet to explore more feature.

Regards,
Nimeesh Ramakrishnan

Positives
1. IPS panel. Excellent and vibrant picture quality, better than my LG 32" full HD LCD TV.
2. Affordable price. Got it at Rs.16.5k. So why to buy LG/Samsung/Sony at 5-10k higher or why to buy other unestablished brands at the same rate or few grands cheaper.
3. Good design

Negatives
1. Confusing remote. Who cares. Once you adjust the parameters, do you need a remote any more.

Go ahead with this if you want to buy a 32" LED TV

Well to be honest Best LED TV in 20k. I have Sony bravia 32inch led with me. I compared both really this Panasonic led TV is better then Sony.in picture quality.But sound quality not upto mark. But its excellent TV in the price range guys just go for it.

From 2 days am using this TV . The product is very good . With a good picture quality and also the sound quality is very good it has USB support so we can listen songs watch movie and photos . I got the delivery within 4 days and the installation is done on the next day of the delivery . The product is very good . Am satisfied with it. If u r trying to go for it. Go for it right now

Thanks Flipkart and WS retail.

Very nice deal bought it on Freedom Sale offer. Wow! deal I booked this tv just for 16470/- which was very cheap compared to any other website or outlets. Now TV is working very good and clarity is awesome in SD channels itself. Desparatly Waiting for the next deal. Hatsoff!! flipkart!!!!

Flipkart delivered this in no time. Installation was smooth and happened in 2 days only. TV quality is good. It took almost 1 month to select a LED TV and i am happy with the decision i made. Definitely will recommend this TV.

one day delivery and installation with demo is done by flipkart and panasonic. I am very happy with service. Tv is marvelous and it play full hd video very smooth although the remote design is not that much good as compare to other tv.

Pros:

1. Picture: SUPERB Picture quality!!! Especially HD channels are feast for eyes. Full HD vs HD difference is visible only if you watch the TV within 2 Meters.

2. Angle View: WOW!!! Awesome!!! Those words won't really tell you my happiness for angle view; it is something more than the word "PERFECT".

3. Price: WHOA!!! another exciting stuff, already at the best price in Flipkart and an additional happiness of 10% Citi bank cash back with EMI and I got a Panasonic 32" LED TV just around 15K, yeah, it is not a deal absolutely a steal the deal, I'm in heaven guys!!!

4. Delivery & Installation: As always Flipkart did a good job on delivery and Good experience with installation. I got an install ticket number along with the name & Phone number of the installation guy right after the delivery.
The guy who came to install offered me Swivel wall mount for Rs. 1850, but I turned down. Anyway, I’m happy with whole delivery and installation process.

Cons:
1. Sound: Sound quality of the TV is not good. But I can't complain, because my Sony Bravia that I purchased for Rs. 42K, has nothing much to offer in terms of sound output from the TV unless I connect to my home theatre system.

2. NO Audio Output: THIS IS THE BIGGEST LET DOWN. YOU DON'T HAVE AN AUDIO OUTPUT, NEITHER HEAD PHONE JACK NOR ANALOG/DIGITAL AUDIO OUTPUT AT ALL.
THE RESULT IS YOU CAN'T CONNECT YOUR TV TO YOUR HOME THEATRE.
In other words, when you play your favourite movie or music video that you have in your pendrive,
you will be forced to listen the audio through TV speakers, not through your home theatre.
You are fine to watch TV when you have an HD set top box, because you could connect the set top box to your home theatre.
I guess Panasonic deliberately left this feature out considering the price bracket it has. But I would expect basic features like this in any TV and that is the one and only reason I'm taking out one star, otherwise it is always 5 star or may be more :) :) :)

Overall, A VERY HAPPY, NICE AND VALUE FOR MONEY PURCHASE EXPERIENCE.
good TV from panasonic and worth for price for sure. Its been 1 month, it looks fine. sound quality and picture quality looks good too. I felt this is better than my current LG full HD Tv

This is a HD ready TV and for a 32'' that is all we need. We do not really need a FULL HD TV. Excellent clarity and colors. Saw many complaints about sound. If you are an audiophile, then you may not satisfy with the sound. For an average user, sound is very good. It is loud enough for a big hall. No complaints. Another complaint I saw in many reviews...

I am using this TV, and my experience is wonderful. Picture quality is very good in both SD & HD channels. Wall mount is very sturdy. Sound quality is good & clear (but not as Samsung or Sony). For 12x12 ft. room sound is Ok.
Price also is very reasonable (bought only in Rs. 16230/-). Flipkart gives original product as it says on TV ads.
Very much happy with product. I will recommend 100% for product and flipkart 4.5 out of 5.

Bought @16490. Delivered and installed as per schedule. Thumbs up for Flipkart and Panasonic.

Features:
1. Display Clarity is superb in both HD channels and SD channels, `cause of IPS Panel.(5/5).
2. Peripherals: only 1 HDMI , 2 would have helped. (3/5).
3. USB plays most movies. Tried to play 1080p HD movies. Great picture quality.
4. Sound is great. You would not need a speaker if your space size is 200sqft. (4/5).
5. Refresh rate: 100hz (5/5). Cheaper alternatives such as micromax have 60hz. faster moving objects are not best seen on those leds.
Overall best buy @ its prices. Great quality
Working well so far. Good colors and picture definition is also very clear. All in all a great buy. Good value for money.

Have been using this TV for a past few days and I am really impressed with the TV. These are the pros and cons I could find:
Pros:
1. The image quality is excellent
2. Audio is quite loud and clear, unlike mentioned in some other reviews
3. The menu was very easy to navigate, again unlike mentioned in those other reviews
4. All the ports work fine, have been using a lot of HDMI and the AV ports since purchase and no complaints yet.
5. The wall mounting bracket comes as a separate package outside the original packing, and is included in the price (both are delivered together as one package).
6. Installation is also included in the price.
7. Delivery was very fast, I am impressed.
8. With all the offers, it cost me around 15K which is an awesome deal.

Cons:
1. There is only one HDMI and one USB port.
2. There is no Audio Out

Must also appreciate the service of Panasonic Coimbatore. The service person turned up on Jan 26 ( a national holiday when almost no office in the country works) just to make sure that the TV is installed in time for me to watch the R-day parade.Really appreciate that.

Excellent LED at this price.and looks good,Very good picture quality in HD channels but Picture quality of SD channels just Ok. Sound is good. Overall good deal. Satisfied with this product. picture Quality looks better then other top brands, with out any doubt can get this product.

Hi Dear Flipkart,

I booked one Panasonic 81cm (32) HD Ready LED TV for 13th July 2016 through on your website. Today I have received my Led Item shipped by Gati Courier : 586201202 at 15:00pm after that reached my home with my courier and after that I check my LED but I saw his power cut automatic off/on ,please revert me at soon as possible,
please do the needful

NOTE:- I want to change this Electronic item ,

Not sure, which one is more worse. This TV or Flipcart customer Service.

Lets start with TV first :HDMI port n USB are placed such a way, after inserting Settop box input in HDMI, u have almost zero place to insert pen drive.if you do a wall mounting u have to forget the idea of watching movies from pendrive. Otherwise every time u have to take down the tv to insert the Pendrive.

Tv gets heated up like any thing after watching an hour or so.

Remote is pathetic, not so userfriendly at all for watching stored movies.

Sound out put is very very lowwww.

If u have HD channels subscribed then channels are ok, but if u have normal cable connection , u r bound to have blurry pic quality. This kind of problem doesnt exsist in my other samsung tv.

Now turn for Flipkart :

I did not like the product at all & i want to buy other model TV, but there is no option of refund, only change of other pice is possible.

I have been calling up there customer care for almost 2 times daily for last 5 days but sadly they do not have any authority what so ever. Only thing they can do is call transfer and arrange for a call back, which will not happen in promised time frame.

I trusted Flipkart n i am suffering now.

If u r not a lazy bone go spend 500 rs extra and buy from local tv shop, trust me they will give far better customer service than flipkart, at least you will be able to check the model much better way.

I guess flipkart product prices are inspired by Stockmarket up n down style. A product Shows up 3 different price tag in 3 consecutive days. U will always in a situation where u think what would be right time to buy the product.

Dont step into trap of low priced product, thats a actually your getway of suffering.

What they promise in Commercial Ads are far away from actually they do in reality.

I had purchased this product. At the time of delivery & installation I had requested that since I do not live in this city I would like to get it installed after a month. At that time the Pansonic person agreed.

When I went to that city after a month, I booked demo & installation. He charged me Rs. 500 because I choose to install after 1 month. Suddenly hidden terms come out. He said " Installation & demo is only free if you do it within 30 days. Otherwise it is chargeable. He also mentioned that per new policy if you don't install within 24 hours, it will be chargeable."

Terrible way to offer a product at lesser price, then recover money from service.

questions: Q:How to extend the warranty of the product?
Q:Is wall mount available with the tv?
Q:Can The tv be connected to home theatre?
Q:How to use computer in this TV (no laptop) cpu computer
Q:Can you make a regular TV smart?
Q:What is the difference between Full HD & HD ready?
Q:Do I get wall mount with the TV?
Q:How do I decide on which screen size is ideal for me?
Q:This Tv Doesn't Have Audio Out jack then how will i connect to woofer?
Q:is tv connectable to Phillips in mms 6060f /94 2.1 speakers?
answers: A:Please visit the brand at http://www.panasonic.com/in/consumer/tv/led-lcd-tv to know about extended warranty
A:Wall mount is not included in the sales package
A:Yes, Using a HDMI cable Home Theatre can be connected to the TV
A:All TVs come with assured brand warranty up to 3 years. You can also get extended warranty at best price on select models
A:A smart TV comes with built-in Internet connectivity, to access a range of online services including video on demand, social networking and may have fully featured web browser to access websites.
A:Yes. You can buy Google Chromecastor smart boxes, such as an Android TV Box or the Apple TV, which turn any HDMI-equipped TV into a smart TV.
A:Full HD has 1920 x 1080 rsolution- ensures a higher picture quality HD ready. It essentially consists of 2Mn pixels vs a 1Mn pixels in HD Ready! Refer to our Buying Guide for more details.
A:Yes wall mount comes free with all 22 inch & above TVs
A:It is the maximum angle at which a display can be viewed with acceptable visual performance
A:HDMI ports are required to connect cable box or Blu-ray player or a video game console or a streaming gadget, or a smartphone/tablet. You can decide the number of inputs required as per your usage.
A:The refresh rate is the number of frames the television can display per second. The standard rate is 60 60 Hz. Higher the rate, smoother the movements in videos- best for fast-moving sports/gaming.

A:Your distance from the screen, most often decides the screen size required. If you're too close, you’ll see a pixelated image & if you're too far, you'll miss details. Check our buying guide for more!
A:split with AV Jack..those we use of 3 colours their is vedio audio jack separate
A:I have not tried to connect to Phillips in mms 6060f /94 2.1 speakers.
